submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums) // 2
        a = nums[:n]
        b = nums[n:][::-1]
        # print(a)
        # print(b)
        cc = defaultdict(list)
        mp = defaultdict(list)
        cnt = [2] * n
        for i, x, y in zip(range(n), a, b):
            cc[abs(x - y)].append(i)
            mp[x].append(i)
            mp[y].append(i)
        ans = n * 2
        L, R = 0, k
        cur = n
        for t in range(k, -1, -1):
            if L <= R:
                for i in mp[L]:
                    cur -= cnt[i] == 2
                    cnt[i] -= 1
            if L < R:
                for i in mp[R]:
                    cur -= cnt[i] == 2
                    cnt[i] -= 1
            L += 1
            R -= 1
            for i in cc[t]:
                if L <= a[i] <= R:
                    cur -= cnt[i] == 2
                    cnt[i] -= 1
                if L <= b[i] <= R:
                    cur -= cnt[i] == 2
                    cnt[i] -= 1
            # print(L, R, t, cc[t], cnt, cur)
            ans = min(ans, n - len(cc[t]) + cur)
            for i in cc[t]:
                if L <= a[i] <= R:
                    cnt[i] += 1
                    cur += cnt[i] == 2
                if L <= b[i] <= R:
                    cnt[i] += 1
                    cur += cnt[i] == 2
        return ans

19
